wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Marriott was a rugby union international who represented England in 1875.

response: *Ernest Marriott, played for England in the last 20 a-side match against Ireland in 1875

link_mentions.page: List of England national rugby union players

response: Ernest Marriott (25 January 1913 – 6 September 1989) was an English professional footballer who made 163 Football League appearances playing as a right back for Brighton & Hove Albion.
